scripts.build: npm run tailwind && npm run sass && cat public/dist/tailwind.css public/dist/custom.css > public/dist/styles.css
scripts.watch:combine: nodemon --watch public/dist/tailwind.css --watch public/dist/custom.css --exec "cat public/dist/tailwind.css public/dist/custom.css > public/dist/styles.css"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:tailwind" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:combine"
